lead_paragraph: As Steve Kerr tried to cope with the headaches, nausea, pain and other concerning symptoms, there were times he wondered whether he would even come back to coach the Golden State Warriors this season, whether he even should return to the bench if not 100 percent healthy.

headline.print_headline: Golden State's Steve Kerr Wins Coach of the Year
headline.main: Golden State's Steve Kerr Wins Coach of the Year
